newsitem.title: SINGAPORE: Singapore bunkers soften on aggressive selling.
newsitem.headline: Singapore bunkers soften on aggressive selling.

text.p: Singapore bunker quotes on Tuesday were quoted lower from Monday with a major seen more aggressive than other sellers, said traders.
Bunker cst 380 was quoted as high as $122 per tonne by some majors and independents. A major was quoting at a low of $$118 per tonne. Bunker cst 180 was indicated at $122, they said.
MDO was quoted at $205-$210 but the same major was indicating at a low of $200. Gas oil was steady at $220--$225. --Singapore Newsroom (+65-8703082).
